entries.title: ChatGPT Creator in Talks for Tender Offer That Would Value It at $29 Billion
entries.description: That valuation would make OpenAI one of the most valuable startups in the U.S., bucking a tech retrenchment.

entries.title: Crypto Lender Genesis Considers Bankruptcy, Lays Off More Staff
entries.description: The firm suffered steep losses from loans it supplied to the now-defunct trading firm Alameda Research and crypto hedge fund Three Arrows Capital.

entries.title: Qualcomm, Iridium Take Aim at Satellite-to-Mobile Phone Market
entries.description: The two companies said said they are introducing technology that would allow smartphone users to send and receive messages via satellite when regular cellular connectivity isn’t available.

entries.title: Mercedes-Benz Plans to Install Its Own Network of EV Chargers
entries.description: Luxury brand intends to install 10,000 chargers globally that drivers of cars with compatible technology can use.

entries.title: Consumers Keeping Up With Cellphone Bills Despite Economic Strains
entries.description: AT&T isn’t seeing “alarming” behavior changes, and Verizon says it isn’t seeing impact from late payments.

entries.title: Tesla's China Deliveries Fell Sharply in December Despite Discounts
entries.description: Tesla’s December deliveries dropped by about 20% from the same month in 2021 and were a little more than half of those made in November.

entries.title: Silvergate Raced to Cover $8.1 Billion in Withdrawals During Crypto Meltdown
entries.description: The bank sold assets at a loss to cover withdrawals and cut 40% of its staff but remains committed to crypto.

entries.title: LionTree Bets on Streaming Ads in Live Sports
entries.description: The boutique bank is leading an investment group that took a majority stake in Transmit.Live, whose technology is used in inserting commercials into programming.

entries.title: Regulations Set to Be Issued This Year Will Determine Course of Deep-Sea Mining
entries.description: The Metals Co. is an early mover in the field for deep-sea exploration for battery metals, but it has warned of a coming funding crunch.

entries.title: Venture Firms' Strategy of Holding Stocks for Longer Backfires
entries.description: Startup investors that held off on exiting investments after their initial public offerings are left to rue the decision.

entries.title: Amazon Layoffs to Hit Over 17,000 Workers, Most in Recent Tech Wave
entries.description: The new figure would be the largest number of cuts revealed by a major technology firm in the past year.

entries.title: U.S. Moves to Seize Robinhood Shares, Silvergate Accounts Tied to FTX
entries.description: Federal authorities’ seizure of funds comes as the prospect of customers recovering some billions in cash and crypto assets remains in limbo.
